subject: ANT and JUNIT Integration Problem
msgSnippet: I am using Ant to compile and test Java code with Junit. Each time I make a change to the Junit test code then use Ant to recompile and run the test it

I am using Ant to compile and test Java code with Junit. 

Each time I make a change to the Junit test code then use Ant to 
recompile and run the test it compiles the test code, but it runs the 
previously compiled version of the test code.

Therefore, I have to run Ant twice to get the results I want.

Note: This happens when there is an existing compiled test code 
already there when you run Ant. In other words, if I run Ant and 
there is no existing compiled test code class (like if I run Ant 
clean first) it will work fine.

Have you seen this before?
